about_the_game: The Crimson Spires soundtrack is an epic score with a blend of synthetic and orchestral sounds. A total of 38 tracks offer a range of moods and atmospheres, from piano and string melodies to slow pads to action-packed beats. Most melodies can be enjoyed in varied moods designed to match the emotions of the story at key moments. Now you can enjoy the music of Crimson Spires whenever you want.
